html:
5.14.20  12:04 pm   whats the divisibility rule for seven and eleven again? i keep on forgetting

      there's no rule, but there's a strategy. for example, take 43288. to see if it's divisible by 7, modify it by 7s until you recognize it as divisible by 7 or not. and you can also divide by anything, if that's convenient. Right where it is, we can subtract 28, which will knock off a zero. 43260, and divide by 10. is 4326. this seems way easy to cut in half, which is a legit transformation, but for now i'll skip that. if you want, you could add 14, to get 4340 -->434. then subtract 14, is 42. bingo, that's a multiple of 7. so 43288 is divisible by 7.
another strategy would be to cut it in half several times first, if that feels convenient. 43288 looks pretty easy to cut in half. just look at it like 4 32 88. and cut everything in half. 2 16 44. then again, 1 08 22. look at it like 108 22, now again, 54 11.... So from there, you could add 49 to even it off, or, here's another trick, you can go from the left, it's sometimes much faster. if you can think of a multiple of 7 that's close but below any of the left of the number, you can replace that with the distance away it is. For example- looking at 5411, i can see 54 on the left, and that's clearly 5 above 49. Well you can just replace 54 with 5. 511. Now, you can do it again, just look at 51, clearly 2 above 49. so knock off the 51 and replace it with 2. so you get 21. which is clearly a multiple of 7. so that means the original number was also a multiple of 7, because we have only made transformations which will not destroy its status of whether or not it is a multiple of 7.
Here's the 'left' method again from the original 43288, without doing all the cutting in half, just to show that it works that way too. 43288, you can clearly see the 43 is 1 above 42. so replace the 43 with just 1. so 1288, and now you can see 12 is 5 above 7, so replace 12 with 5. 588. 58 is just above 56 (2 away), so replace 58 with 2, that's 28. so it works that way too. often going from the left is much quicker.
Another example, checking 43288 for 11, well right away just knock off the 88. that's 432. seems easy enough to subtract 22 from the right, so 41. so no.
To cheat and show you an example that works, let's check 417521302 for 11. Seems easy to add 88 to the right, that's 417521390, drop the zero is 41752139. now add 11 to the right, 4175215. (dropping zeros as i go, of course). now add 55 to the right, 417527. now add 33 to the right, 41756. now add 44 to the right. 41800, drop zeros, 418. add 22 is 440 = 44, which you should recognize as a multiple of 11. Going from the left may have been quicker but i was actually just too lazy to compare 41 with 33. But if we had done that, from the original 417521302, it would have gone like this-- replace 41 with 8 (because 33 is 8 below 41-- and this only works when 33 is BELOW 41, in otherwords you can't replace with 3 here (44) that won't work). 87521302. You can replace 87 with 10 (87 is 10 above 77) 10521302. you can replace 105 with 6 (because 105 is 6 above 99). 621302. you can replace 62 with 7 (it's 7 above 55). 71302. you can replace 71 with 5 (because it's 5 above 66). 5302. you can replace 53 with 9 (because it's 9 above 44). 902. And you can replace 90 with 2 (because it's 2 above 88). so you're left with 22, which you should recognize as a multiple of 11

5.14.20  12:03 pm   Where does the sun go after it sets?

      it stays where it is, but where do You go

5.14.20  11:46 am   do dogs know what we are saying?

      no but they usually know what we're doing

5.14.20  10:48 am   what's your favorite breakfast cereal?

      lunch

5.14.20  10:45 am   Where is the ocean?

      i can hardly remember

5.14.20  10:40 am   thoughts on wet sponge?

      its most miraculous quality is its ability to appear dry

5.14.20  10:25 am   are you just gathering material for a song called "questions"?

      no

5.14.20  10:18 am   What is your opinion

      darkness is actually very bright

5.14.20  9:58 am   opinions on croc shoes?

      they are rumoured to be lighter than their own weight

5.14.20  9:35 am    do things ever stop changing 

      no

5.14.20  9:26 am   What's 0 divided by 0?

      don't worry about it

5.14.20  8:31 am   if you are interested in reinventing the  graphics dept, there is this channel called twominutepapers which simulates lots of stuff have you seen it?

      yes, but nothing they ever talk about is ever available yet

5.14.20  8:18 am   When will you make more content,

     right away

      your stuff is legendary.

      that's very friendly of you

5.14.20  6:52 am   whats this special project that your working on?

      i am re-inventing the graphics department. i did not plan this

5.14.20  6:44 am   what do you do when you are recognized in public?

      wasn't me

5.14.20  6:38 am   what is your favorite vegeteable

      sprout. ... or, .. what are the ones that sprout from the ground. is that sprouts

5.14.20  6:06 am   what is the worst key signature?

      after 7 flats, or 7 sharps, you can keep making it worse by adding more. no limit

5.14.20  5:31 am   is the universe a metaphor for consciousness?

      other way around

5.14.20  5:22 am   Do you remember the days gone by?

      some of them, and i have the rest written down

5.14.20  4:33 am   is it pathetic to be upset by having your laptop being unusable due to a charger defect?

      no. computers are very integral to many of our lives. computer problems may have a very large impact on your life. kind of like if there is a problem with your car, or house

5.14.20  4:12 am   sleeping is basically staring at your eyelids for 8-9 hours

      that's not entirely true

5.14.20  3:49 am   What should I do when my grass has turned orange

      harvest it!

5.14.20  3:38 am   When you hear "Washington" do you think of the state or D.C.?

      george

5.14.20  3:29 am   Would you trust a goose to fly a plane?

      no

5.14.20  2:44 am   got any pet peeves? 

      i prefer not to keep peeves as pets. i believe peeves should run wild, and free

5.14.20  2:42 am   how many bagels is too many

      1. but don't let that stop you. living on the edge is the essence of bagel life

      i like the part where you get to turn the page

5.14.20  2:14 am   i am about to do something very important and impactful for my life and the world. can you feel the excitement?

      yes

      never heard of it

5.14.20  2:00 am   thoughts on jaywalking?

      never heard of it

      check your itinerary

      you, and me

     sort of

     yes, that's the main thing i like about them

      things changing, staying the same, and changing between changing and staying the same

      that's not entirely true

      what if i woke up recently

5.14.20  1:05 am   can you tell us a joke?

      what the heck is a joke

      i know exactly how the song goes. but not exactly 'how' that will be executed

      it's surprisingly South
